item.description:
Instead of our usual meeting.... let's try a day-trip up to Manchester NH for the The Knit & Crochet Show. Checkout www.knitandcrochetshow.com for a description of the event.

I propose leaving Northborough Library at 10am, looks like it's about an 1 1/2 hour trip from there, so we can be at the event from 11:30 till maybe about 2:30/3ish and then head home. We'll work on coordinating transportation. We can fill my van, or buddy up in a few cars...whatever works.

TKGA and CGOA members enter for FREE, otherwise it's $10 entry, but there are discount coupons on the web page if you sign up for their email.

and off we go...
item.name: FIELDTRIP!!! The Knit & Crochet Show - Manchest NH.
